November 4, 2025 Special Election

A special election for the City of Troy to be held on November 4, 2025 for the purpose of reauthorizing the City of Troy's one-fourth of one percent (1/4%) sales tax for street maintenance.

November 2, 2021 Special Election

A special election for the City of Troy to be held on November 2, 2021 for the purpose of reauthorizing the City of Troy's one-fourth of one percent (1/4%) sales tax for street maintenance.

View here: Location and Hours (English)

View here: Location and Hours (Spanish)

View here: Sample Ballot

 

Municipal Election- May 1, 2021

As a General Law City, the City of Troy elects a Mayor and 2 council members (this year) and 3 council members at-large on the following year. In this years election, May 1, 2021, the Mayor Michael Morgan is unopposed. Incumbents Paul Ramirez and Jason Sheffler are joined on the ballot by challenger  Vance Camp. This years City Council  Election will be conducted Saturday,  May 1, 2021 (7a-7p) at Troy Community Center. Early voting will be week days,  April 19 - April 22 (7a-5p),  April 23 (7a-7p), April 26 (7a-5p) and April 27 (7a-7p).

ORDINANCE 2021-02-1

AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF TROY, TEXAS, ORDERING A GENERAL ELECTION TO BE HELD ON MAY 1st, 2021 FOR THE PURPOSE OF ELECTING TWO (2) CITY COUNCIL MEMBERS AND A MAYOR AT LARGE; DESIGNATING THE POLLING PLACE AT WHICH VOTING SHALL TAKE PLACE; APPOINTING AN EARLY VOTING CLERK; PROVIDING FOR NOTICE OF SAID ELECTION.

BE IT ORDAINED BY THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF TROY, TEXAS:

Section 1.  That the Mayor of the City of Troy, Texas with the concurrence of the City Council, orders a General Election to be held on May 1, 2021, for the purpose of electing two Council Members and a Mayor for a two-year term. 

Section 2. The election day polling place in the City of Troy for this election is as follows:

City of Troy Community Center

201 E,. Main Street

Troy, Texas 76579

Hours: 7a-7p

 

Section 3. That the Municipal Clerk or her designee shall serve as early voting clerk and shall receive applications by mail for a ballot to be voted by mail and may serve as the contracting officer of none other is selected. Requests for applications should be mailed to:

Jeanine Oosse

201 E. Main Street

Troy, Texas 76579

Section 4. Early voting shall be conducted by personal appearance at theCity of Troy Community Center 201 E,. Main Street, Troy, Texas 76579. during the period early voting is required or permitted by law, being Monday, April 19, 2021 through Tuesday, April 27th, 2021. The hours designated for early voting by personal appearance shall be determined by the contracting officer. The polling places will also be open for extended early voting by personal appearance on Friday, April 23 and Tuesday April 27th, from 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. The Contracting Officer shall serve as the early voting clerk.

Section 5. The Contracting Officer in partnership with the Municipal Clerk shall be responsible for the official ballots for said election to be prepared and printed in conformity with the Texas Election Code, adopted by the Legislature.

 

Section 6. That notice of election shall be given as provided by law.

Section 7. That voting at the election, including early voting shall be by the use of electronic ballots and/or machines, which have been duly approved by the Secretary of State.

APPROVED AND ADOPTED ON FEBRUARY 8TH,  2021.

________________________________________ Mayor Michael Morgan

 

ATTEST:                                                                                                                                 SEAL

__________________________________________ Jeanine Oosse

ORDENANZA 2021-02-1(s)

UNA ORDENANZA DEL CONSEJO MUNICIPAL DE LA CIUDAD DE TROY, TEXAS, QUE ORDENA UNA ELECCIN GENERAL PARA EL 1 DE MAYO DE 2021 CON EL PROPSITO DE ELEGIR DOS (2) MIEMBROS DEL CONSEJO MUNICIPAL Y UN ALCALDE EN GRANDE; DESIGNANDO EL LUGAR DE VOTACIN EN EL QUE SE REALIZAR LA VOTACIN; NOMBRAR UN SECRETARIO DE VOTACIN ANTICIPADA; DISPONIENDO AVISO DE DICHA ELECCIN.

SE ORDENE POR EL CONSEJO MUNICIPAL DE LA CIUDAD DE TROY, TEXAS:

Seccin 1. Que el Alcalde de la Ciudad de Troy, Texas, con la concurrencia del Concejo Municipal, ordene que se celebre una Eleccin General el 1 de mayo de 2021, con el propsito de elegir dos miembros del Concejo y un Alcalde por un perodo de dos aos la durucin.

Seccin 2. El lugar de votacin el da de las elecciones en la ciudad de Troy para esta eleccin es el siguiente:                                    Centro Comunitario de la Ciudad de Troy

201 E. Main Street

Troy, Texas 76579

Horas: 7a-7p

Seccin 3. Que la Secretaria Municipal o su designado actuar como secretaria de votacin anticipada y recibir solicitudes por correo para que se vote una boleta por correo si no podr actuar como oficial de contratacin de nadie ms. Las solicitudes de las aplicacines deben enviarse por correo a:

Jeanine Oosse

201 E. Main Street

Troy, Texas 76579

Seccin 4. La votacin anticipada se llevar a cabo en persona en el Centro Comunitario de la Ciudad de Troy.

201 E. Main Street, Troy, Texas 76579. durante el perodo que la ley requiere o permite la votacin anticipada, desde el lunes 19 de abril de 2021 hasta el martes 27 de abril de 2021. Se determinarn las horas designadas para la votacin anticipada en persona. por el oficial de contratacin. Los lugares de votacin tambin estarn abiertos para votacin anticipada extendida en persona el viernes 23 de abril y el martes 27 de abril, de 7:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m. El Oficial de Contrataciones actuar como secretario de votacin anticipada.

Seccin 5. El Oficial de Contrataciones en asociacin con el Secretario Municipal ser responsable de que las boletas oficiales para dicha eleccin sean preparadas e impresas de conformidad con el Cdigo Electoral de Texas, adoptado por la Legislatura.

Seccin 6. Ese aviso de eleccin se dar segn lo dispone la ley.

Seccin 7. Que la votacin en la eleccin, incluida la votacin anticipada, se har mediante el uso de boletas electrnicas y / o mquinas, las cuales hayan sido debidamente aprobadas por el Secretario de Estado.                   

APROBADA Y ADOPTADA EL 8 DE FEBRERO DE 2021.

_____________________

Alcalde Michael Morgan

Testimomio:                                                                                Sellar

____________________________

Secretaria municipal  Jeanine Oosse
